item.title: Report E-2025030297
item.description:
Report E-2025030297

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: LEXINGTON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Eagle driver turned right on red at a double right turn lane. Other truck was on the inside turn lane and swung into ETC lane. Other truck stopped but Eagle trailer made contact with other tractor. Small release of less than 10 gals of gas spilled from wetlines on trailer. The product cleaned by the fire department.
